text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Local and State can manage interpreters to help protect their residents,  this should be a given for federal especially when updating on a health epidemic. 3+ weeks, still no ASL. #whereistheinterpreter 
https://t.co/YlEavjJzPH
